title: Incumbent Darkness
description: Rae Filipowski, the popular Governor of Maine, is on the brink of her first re-election campaign. However, the untimely and unusual death of her husband has sent her into a spiral of grief that has impacted her ability to campaign effectively. When a candidate from her own party challenges her in the primary, both candidates soon become impacted by a series of strange and unexplained events.Seeking discretion, Rae quietly brings in the paranormal investigation team led by Cassie Stone. Along with her partner, Danny Taylor, they uncover a damning history, not only of the Governor's home, but of the quiet town of Cape Andre.
author: Vin Petrini
